bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XLVI (Nos 4401-4441) with contributions by P.G. McC. BROWN, G.B. D'ALESSIO, R. LUISELLI, M. MAEHLER, P.J. PARSONS, J.R. REA

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.note: et XIX pll., dont 1 pl. dépl.
P. Oxy. LXIV, 4401-4441. - I. New Testament (4401-4406). - II. Comedy (4407-4412). - III. Hellenistic Poets (4413-4432). - IV. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4433-4441).
bibl.seg: HANDLEY E.W., U. WARTENBERG and R.A. COLES, N. GONIS, M.W. HASLAM, J.D. THOMAS, with contributions by P.G. McC. BROWN, G.B. D'ALESSIO, R. LUISELLI, M. MAEHLER, P.J. PARSONS, J.R. REA, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXIV (Nos 4401-4441). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 84.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1997, 8°, xii-209 pp. et XIX pll., dont 1 pl. dépl. ISBN 0-85698-129-X.
P. Oxy. LXIV, 4401-4441. - I. New Testament (4401-4406). - II. Comedy (4407-4412). - III. Hellenistic Poets (4413-4432). - IV. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4433-4441).

C.R. par Stanley Ireland, CR N.S., 48 (1998) pp. 449-451. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 74 (1999) No. 147, pp. 177-181. - George M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 48 (1998) pp. 179-181 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LXIII].
Handley Wartenberg Coles Gonis Haslam Thomas Brown D'Alessio Luiselli Maehler Parsons Rea
